name: tatami mat
description: A type of mat used as a flooring material in traditional Japanese-style rooms.

name: pillow fort
description: A comfy place to hide from the world.  Not very defensible, though.

name: cardboard fort
description: A fort built by tipping a cardboard box on its side, lining it with blankets, and partly weather-sealing it with a plastic sheet.

name: cardboard wall
description: A pile of cardboard boxes that have been filled with rags and junk and stacked together like bricks to form a wall.

name: cardboard floor
description: A flat floor made of sheets of cardboard duct-taped together, covering a plastic sheet on the ground.

name: cardboard roof
description: A sloped roof made of cardboard boxes, stuffed with scrap cardboard and paper and layered atop each other.  Sheets of plastic are carefully arranged on top to shed water.  It looks like it could last a season or two at least before crumbling.

name: cardboard door
description: A pile of cardboard boxes that have been filled with rags and junk and stacked together like bricks to form a wall.  The largest box has been cut open and folded to form a makeshift door, which is open.

name: cardboard door
description: A pile of cardboard boxes that have been filled with rags and junk and stacked together like bricks to form a wall.  The largest box has been cut open and folded to form a makeshift door, which is closed.

name: beaded curtain
description: A curtain of wooden beads, thick enough that you can't see through them.  They could be pulled aside effortlessly.

name: open beaded curtain
description: A curtain of wooden beads that has been pulled aside.

name: canvas floor
description: Flooring made out of stretched, waterproof cloth.  Helps keep dirt out of the tent.

name: canvas wall
description: A tent wall made of stretched, waterproof cloth.

name: canvas wall
description: A tent wall made of stretched, heavy-duty, waterproof cloth.

name: large skin wall
description: A large tent wall made out of stretched animal skin.  It'll keep the rain out, but anything trying to get in could rip through it fairly easily.

name: large skin groundsheet
description: A large animal-skin groundsheet to keep your feet dry inside the shelter.

name: large skin groundsheet
description: A large animal-skin groundsheet to keep your feet dry inside the shelter.

name: large animalskin flap
description: A large animal-skin flap that can be pulled aside.

name: open animalskin flap
description: A large animal-skin flap that has been pulled aside.

name: canvas flap
description: A canvas flap door that can be pulled aside.

name: open canvas flap
description: A canvas flap door that has been pulled aside.

name: canvas flap
description: A heavy canvas flap door that can be pulled aside.

name: open canvas flap
description: A heavy canvas flap door that has been pulled aside.

name: groundsheet
description: A plastic groundsheet to keep your feet dry inside the tent.

name: groundsheet
description: A large plastic groundsheet to keep your feet dry inside the tent.

name: groundsheet
description: A plastic groundsheet to keep your feet dry inside the tent.

name: groundsheet
description: A government-issue plastic groundsheet to keep your feet dry, it was clearly made by the lowest bidder.

name: animalskin wall
description: A tent wall made out of stretched animal skin.  It'll keep the rain out, but anything trying to get in could rip through it fairly easily.

name: animalskin flap
description: An animal-skin flap that can be pulled aside.

name: open animalskin flap
description: An animal-skin flap that has been pulled aside.

name: animalskin floor
description: An animal-skin groundsheet to keep your feet dry inside the shelter.

name: pile of rubble
description: A pile of various metals, bricks, and other building materials.  You could clear it with a shovel.

name: pile of rocky rubble
description: A loose pile of rocks.  Useless?

name: pile of trashy rubble
description: A pile of trash topped with dirt and grass.  It smells gross, but one man's trash…

name: metal wreckage
description: A pile of various bent and twisted metals.  Some of it looks pretty rusty, you wouldn't want to cut yourself on this.

name: radioactive slag
description: A pile of melted slag from a destroyed nuclear reactor.  What are you doing looking at it?  Get the hell out of here, you nutcase!

name: pile of ash
description: A pile of ash, from wood or possibly corpses.

name: small boulder
description: A big rock.  Should be easy to roll around, but too heavy to carry with you.  It can be used as a primitive anvil, or broken into a bunch of smaller rocks.

name: medium boulder
description: A pretty big boulder, but still small enough to see and climb over.  It would be a struggle to move it.  It can be used as a primitive anvil, or broken into a bunch of smaller rocks.

name: large boulder
description: A boulder that's taller than you.  Now how are you going to move this?

name: street light
description: A raised light source which used to illuminate streets and their surrounding area, but it's useless without electricity.

name: traffic light
description: A signaling device positioned at road intersections and pedestrian crossings to control the flow of traffic, but it's useless without electricity.

name: bike rack
description: A loop of metal in the shape of an upside down U used to securely park bikes.

name: flagpole
description: A 6-meter tall metal flagpole.  You could hoist up a flag here.

name: flagpole
description: A 5-meter tall wooden flagpole.  You could hoist up a flag here.

name: utility pole
description: A long wooden post which used to support overhead power lines and other public utilities, but it doesn't work anymore.

name: scrap metal bridge
description: A simple bridge made of riveted sheet metal.

name: room divider
description: A tall piece of furniture used to divide rooms into separate areas.

name: short mound of dirt
description: An area of heaped dirt, not easily traversable.  If examined more closely, it's quite favorable for planting seeds and the like.

name: short mound of dirt with seed
description: An area of heaped dirt, not easily traversable.  Someone has planted a seed here.

name: short mound of dirt with seedling
description: An area of heaped dirt, not easily traversable.  There is a seed here, that has just begun to sprout its first roots.

name: short mound of dirt with mature plant
description: An area of heaped dirt, not easily traversable.  There is a matured plant here, that should be ready for harvest before long.

name: short mound of dirt with harvestable plant
description: An area of heaped dirt, not easily traversable.  There is a fully grown plant, and will need closer examination to harvest.

name: mound of dirt
description: An area of dirt heaped up to your shoulders, not easily traversable.  If examined more closely, it's quite favorable for planting seeds and the like.

name: mound of dirt with seed
description: An area of dirt heaped up to your shoulders, not easily traversable.  Someone has planted a seed here.

name: mound of dirt with seedling
description: An area of dirt heaped up to your shoulders, not easily traversable.  There is a seed here, that has just begun to sprout its first roots.

name: mound of dirt with mature plant
description: An area of dirt heaped up to your shoulders, not easily traversable.  There is a matured plant here, that should be ready for harvest before long.

name: mound of dirt with harvestable plant
description: An area of dirt heaped up to your shoulders, not easily traversable.  There is a fully grown plant, and will need closer examination to harvest.

name: tall mound of dirt
description: An area of dirt heaped well above your head, difficult to climb over.

description: An area of heaped sand, not easily traversable.

name: mound of sand
description: An area of sand heaped up to your shoulders, not easily traversable.

name: short mound of broken glass
description: An area of heaped glass shards, not safely traversable.  Just looking at it feel like you'll get tetanus.

name: mound of broken glass
description: An area of broken glass shards heaped up to your shoulders, not safely traversable.  Just looking at it feel like you'll get tetanus.

name: tall mound of broken glass
description: An area of broken glass heaped well above your head, unsafe to climb.  Just looking at it feel like you'll get tetanus.
